pr_title: fix(escapeXML): Added missing escapeXML ,to prevent js script execution and rendering break due to single or double qoutes

timeline.bodyText: May be method reference can be used here StringEscapeUtils::escapeXml
timeline.author: smrutis1

timeline.message:
fix(escapeXML): Added missing escapeXML ,to prevent js script execution and rendering break due to single or double qoutes
  * Added missing escapeXml to merge-split Component, merge releases, license details view, list-details-edit view of project, component and release.

Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit <jaideep.palit@siemens.com>
